meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one thousandth of a second.
meanings.sent1: She measured the time in milliseconds using the stopwatch.
meanings.sent2: The computer processed the data in milliseconds.
meanings.sent3: It took him milliseconds to realize he had forgotten his keys.
meanings.sent4: The hummingbird's wings beat so fast, it seemed like they moved in milliseconds.
meanings.sent5: The speed of the car was so fast that every millisecond felt like an eternity.
